name: Graph Theory
text:
To be yarn-strung/ Together/ Looped through our sleeves/ With small hooks and wires.

/ To be railcar/ And subway commuters.

/ This is how the {Valley, Bay} connects.

/ Just enough crosstalk./ A few cliques (clicks)./ Apple !xor Google at hand.

/ Another conductor/ Manning the speaker./ Fumbling the same directions/ From time to time./
